text: Ronald Barritt (15 April 1919 - June 2004) was an English professional footballer who played as a striker in the Football League for Doncaster Rovers, Leeds United and York City, and in non-League football for Wombwell Town and Frickley Colliery. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Huddersfield Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Frickley Athletic F.C. players Category:Leeds United F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Wombwell Town F.C. (1940s) players
title: Ron Barritt
